scripts.clean: rm -rf .expo node_modules/.cache ios/build ios/Pods android/app/build android/.gradle && echo 'âœ… Cache cleared'
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/build ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock && echo 'âœ… iOS cache cleared'
scripts.clean:android: rm -rf android/app/build android/.gradle && echo 'âœ… Android cache cleared'
scripts.clean:expo: rm -rf .expo node_modules/.cache && echo 'âœ… Expo cache cleared'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && watchman watch-del-all && echo 'âœ… All caches cleared'
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && echo 'âœ… Dependencies reinstalled'
scripts.reinstall:ios: npm run reinstall && npm run clean:ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && echo 'âœ… iOS dependencies reinstalled'
scripts.reinstall:all: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock && pnpm install && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && echo 'âœ… All dependencies reinstalled'
scripts.rebuild:ios: npm run clean:ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && npm run ios
scripts.rebuild:android: npm run clean:android && npm run android
scripts.fresh-start: npm run clean:all && npm run ios
scripts.nuke: npm run clean:all && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock && pnpm install && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && echo 'ðŸ’£ Project nuked and reinstalled!'
